DOC.brief_summary: Walnuts whole food contain polyunsaturated fatty acid , anti-oxidants , nutrient essential sperm development function . This randomize controlled trial seek determine Western style diet supplement walnut would improve sperm quality predictor male fertility .

Hypothesis The investigator hypothesize diet enrich walnut improve semen quality . Semen quality predictive marker male infertility sub-fertility , thus , overall goal determine dietary intake walnut benefit male reproductive health . A randomized , control intervention use study effect walnut supplementation semen quality measure young men ( age 21 35 ) eat Western diet . Participants enrol West Los Angeles area ( n=120 ) . Men randomly assign consume 3 oz walnut per day part usual diet continue habitual diet avoid nut . Each follow assign diet three month cover one complete cycle spermatogenesis . The specific aim study : 1 . Establish baseline : habitual diet ; serum omega-3 omega-6 ratio , serum selenium folate ; semen quality ( sperm count , motility , morphology ) sperm DNA integrity ( COMET assay ) ; sperm aneuploidy ; semen anti-oxidant level 2 . Randomly assign men habitual diet plus 3 oz walnut per day usual diet without nut three month monitor six telephone 24 hour dietary recall 3 . Compare intervention control group three month blood semen measure 4 . Compare blood semen measure within man baseline three month .
